openapi: 3.0.0 info: contact: email: api@factset.com name: FactSet Research Systems description: | The FactSet People API exposes FactSet data for individuals and their jobs. title: FactSet People API version: 1.0.0 servers: - description: Production Server url: https://api.factset.com/content security: - FactSetApiKey: [] - FactSetOAuth2: [] tags: - description: Return information about the person with the specified entity ID. name: Profiles - description: Returns the job history of the person name: Job History - description: Returns a list of associated people for a requested company name: Company paths: /factset-people/v1/profiles: get: description: | Returns a summary of basic information about the person referenced by the entityId specified in the URI. operationId: getPeopleProfiles parameters: - description: List of FactSet Person Entity identifier. example: - 0DPHLH-E - 07MZV9-E explode: false in: query name: ids required: true schema: items: type: string maxItems: 500 minItems: 1 type: array style: form responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/peopleProfilesResponse' description: Array of Profile Ojects "400": content: application/json: examples: Bad Request - Date Format: $ref: '#/components/examples/badRequestDateFormat' Bad Request - Missing Required Parameter: $ref: '#/components/examples/badRequestRequiredParameter' Bad Request - Invalid Parameter: $ref: '#/components/examples/badRequestInvalidParameters' Bad Request - Malformed JSON: $ref: '#/components/examples/badRequestMalformedJSON' Bad Request - Read Timeout: $ref: '#/components/examples/badRequestReadTimeout' schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/errorResponse' description: Bad Request. ***ids limit** = 1000 per request*

Make note, GET Method URL request lines are also limited to a total length of 8192 bytes (8KB).
